title: Manage Clinical Trial Supplies
description: A clinical supply manager needs to ship investigational product (IP) to a clinical site based on their patient enrollment rate.

tasks.description: Review the current inventory of IP at a specific clinical site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the site's inventory is running low.

tasks.description: Check the site's patient enrollment forecast for the next month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees that the site is expected to enroll 5 new patients.

tasks.description: Calculate the amount of IP needed for the resupply shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates that 10 kits are needed to meet the forecasted demand and safety stock levels.

tasks.description: Create a shipment order for the IP to be sent to the clinical site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates a shipment order in the inventory management system.
